breakdowns.description: Enables users to add, edit, delete, and update the status of tasks, including specifying task details such as title, description, priority, due date, and categorization.
conditions: Task must have a title, description, priority, and due date when added.
Tasks can be marked as Completed or Pending.
Confirmation prompt is required before deleting a task.

breakdowns.description: Allows users to categorize, filter, sort, and search tasks to efficiently view and manage their task list.
conditions: Tasks can be categorized (e.g., Work, Personal, Study).
Tasks can be filtered by status: All, Completed, Pending.
Tasks can be sorted by due date or priority.
Tasks can be searched by keyword.

breakdowns.description: Provides a responsive interface with clear visual indicators for task status, confirmation prompts for deletions, and appropriate messaging when no tasks exist.
conditions: Design must be responsive for desktop and mobile devices.
Completed tasks must have clear visual indicators.
Display an empty-state message when no tasks exist.

breakdowns.description: Ensures that all tasks are stored and persist across page refreshes using browser local storage or a backend database.
conditions: Tasks must be stored using browser local storage or a backend database.
Tasks must persist after page refresh.

breakdowns.description: Enables users to toggle between dark and light modes and view statistics about their tasks.
conditions: Users can toggle between dark mode and light mode.
Display statistics: total tasks, completed tasks, pending tasks.
